borderRadius.$description: radio.borderRadius — Radio border radius (full/50%). Circular shape distinguishes radio buttons from checkboxes (which are square with minimal rounding).

borderWidth.$description: radio.borderWidth — Radio border width (1px). Thin border provides clear boundary without visual heaviness. Thickens visually when selected due to fill color.

ringOffset.$description: radio.focus.ringOffset — Focus ring offset (2px). Space between radio border and focus ring. Prevents ring from overlapping radio border.

ringWidth.$description: radio.focus.ringWidth — Focus ring width (2px). Clearly visible ring around radio when focused via keyboard. Essential for accessibility compliance.

lg.$description: radio.innerCircle.size.lg — Large inner dot size (10px). Proportional to lg radio. More prominent dot for better visibility.

md.$description: radio.innerCircle.size.md — Medium inner dot size (8px). DEFAULT. Proportional to md radio. Clear visual feedback for selected state.

sm.$description: radio.innerCircle.size.sm — Small inner dot size (7px). Proportional to sm radio.

xl.$description: radio.innerCircle.size.xl — Extra large inner dot size (12px). Proportional to xl radio. Maximum visibility dot.

xs.$description: radio.innerCircle.size.xs — Extra small inner dot size (6px). Proportional to xs radio. Small but visible indicator of selected state.

fontSize.$description: radio.label.fontSize — Label font size (14px). Standard body text size for form labels. Readable alongside radio without overwhelming.

gap.$description: radio.label.gap — Gap between radio and label (12px). Provides clear visual separation while maintaining association. Label click should toggle radio.

lg.$description: radio.size.lg — Large radio size (24px). Use for: touch-optimized interfaces, accessibility-focused forms, prominent single options. Better for mobile devices.

md.$description: radio.size.md — Medium radio size (20px). DEFAULT size. Use for: most forms, settings panels, standalone options. Good balance of visibility and space efficiency.

sm.$description: radio.size.sm — Small radio size (16px). Use for: standard form density, inline options, filter panels. Common in desktop applications.

xl.$description: radio.size.xl — Extra large radio size (28px). Use for: high-emphasis standalone selections, large touch targets, accessibility requirements. Maximum visibility and tap target size.

xs.$description: radio.size.xs — Extra small radio size (14px). Use for: compact data tables, dense lists, space-constrained UIs. May not meet touch target guidelines (44px) - consider for mouse-only interfaces.

duration.$description: radio.transition.duration — Radio transition duration (100ms). Fast transition for snappy feedback when selecting. Should feel instant but smooth.

easing.$description: radio.transition.easing — Radio transition easing (ease-out). Decelerating motion feels natural for selection actions.
